title: Game Failing to Launch/Open (Mac)
body:
Firstly yes i know its mac, point made for all the "Master Race" diehards.

So, tried to launch the game several times this morning to no success even with restarting the comp every now and then.
Uninstalled the game and then reinstalled completely from (https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)
Still the game is failing to launch at all.

Anyone help or having the same issue?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I know this might sound silly, but are you sure you're installing the game correctly?

Many mac users make the same mistake, please follow the guide on how to [reinstall the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac) and let me know how you go.
